title: Research Web
description: Search the web, analyze pages, and fact-check claims using AI-powered research
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: search
commands.description: Search the web for information on a topic

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

returns.description: Array of search result objects with title, url, snippet, and relevance score

commands.name: analyze_url
commands.description: Fetch and analyze the content of a specific URL

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to fetch and analyze

parameters.name: questions
parameters.description: Specific questions to answer about the page content

returns.description: Analysis object with summary, answers to questions, key facts, and metadata

commands.name: fact_check
commands.description: Verify a claim by cross-referencing multiple sources

parameters.name: claim
parameters.description: The claim or statement to fact-check

parameters.name: sources_count
parameters.description: Minimum number of sources to consult

returns.description: Fact-check result with verdict (true/false/partially_true/unverifiable), confidence score, supporting sources, and reasoning
